stimulusHtml: On which of the following intervals is the object’s velocity decreasing over the entire interval?

features.html:
• The graph is labeled Graph of v.
  • The horizontal axis is labeled with t as the variable and ranges from 0 to 11 in increments of 1.
  • The vertical axis is labeled v of t and ranges from negative 3 to 3 in increments of 1.
  • The graph is composed of four line segments that are connected. Moving from left to right:
    • The first segment begins at the origin and moves down and to the right, ending at (3 comma negative 2).
    • The second segment begins at (3 comma negative 2) and moves up and to the right, passing through (4 comma 0) and ending at (5 comma 2).
    • The third segment begins at (5 comma 2) and extends horizontally, ending at (8 comma 2).
    • The fourth segment begins at (8 comma 2) and moves down and to the right, ending on the t axis at (10 comma 0).

An object travels along a horizontal line with velocity given by the function v. The graph of  y = v t , which consists of four line segments, is shown for  0 ≤ t ≤ 10 .

choicesHtml: 0<t<4
5<t<8
8<t<10 only
0<t<3 and 8<t<10
